scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf web-ext-artifacts; rm src/.amo-upload-uuid
scripts.reset-tags: git tag -l | xargs git tag -d; git fetch --tags
scripts.patch: sh -c '[ -z "$(git status --porcelain)" ] && { git tag $(jq -r ".version" src/manifest.json | xargs npx semver -i patch) && git push origin main --tags; } || echo "There are pending changes in the working directory. Please commit or stash them first."'
scripts.minor: sh -c '[ -z "$(git status --porcelain)" ] && { git tag $(jq -r ".version" src/manifest.json | xargs npx semver -i minor) && git push origin main --tags; } || echo "There are pending changes in the working directory. Please commit or stash them first."'
scripts.revert-tag-patch: sh -c 'TAG=$(jq -r ".version" src/manifest.json | xargs npx semver -i patch) && git tag --delete $TAG && git push --delete origin $TAG'
scripts.revert-tag-minor: sh -c 'TAG=$(jq -r ".version" src/manifest.json | xargs npx semver -i minor) && git tag --delete $TAG && git push --delete origin $TAG'
